LanguageData.FT_BlocksConcrete.label: concrete blocks
LanguageData.FT_BlocksConcrete.description: Packs of concrete. Concrete is a strong and cheap building material, but ugly to look at.
LanguageData.FT_ConcreteCompressed.label: packed concrete
LanguageData.FT_ConcreteCompressed.description: Bags of solid concrete packed tightly packed for storage or trade.
LanguageData.FT_ReinforcedConcreteBag.label: rebar concrete
LanguageData.FT_ReinforcedConcreteBag.description: Bags of solid concrete with rebar mixed in, ready be used as a substitute for metal.
LanguageData.FT_WoodConcrete.label: cement plank
LanguageData.FT_WoodConcrete.description: A plank-shaped prefab plate,useful for fast building and floor laying.
